subject: Football
Suits and Litigation
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s proposed 10-year labor contract would ensure that the 16-game season starts on time, give owners a bigger portion of revenue and strictly limit off-season workouts and how much money rookies can make.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s proposed 10-year labor contract would ensure that the 16-game season starts on time, give owners a bigger portion of revenue and strictly limit off-season workouts and how much money rookies can make.
